0102.name: CORE_UNKNOWN
0102.long_description: Your console experienced an unknown error. This error can be caused by many things, from server issues to home network issues.
0102.short_solution: Try double checking your internet connection or wait.
0102.long_solution:
Due to the unknown nature of the error, there is not one solution. Try waiting a while and try again. You may also try the steps listed on Nintendo's support page https://en-americas-support.nintendo.com/app/answers/detail/a_id/17043/~/error-code%3A-001-0102#:~:text=This%20error%20code%20indicates%20you,a%20poor%20wireless%20network%20environment.

If none of these work, report the issue to a developer.
